job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: KEY QUALIFICATIONS:<br>* BA/BS/BEng or higher degree with emphasis in electrical/network engineering, computer science, analytics, statistics, economics or equivalent degree/experience<br>* 4+ years of experience in data mining & analytics, working with clients and knowledge of data and insights<br>* 4+ years experience in RF engineering, network analytics or network planning<br>* Experience working with large data-sets and an understanding of statistical analysis. Fluency in SQL and scripting languages (Python preferred).<br>* Knowledge of telecom infrastructure network principles, coverage and capacity requirements<br>* Experience working on network performance and analytics for an operator or equipment vendor deploying or operating telecom networks<br>* Strong interpersonal skills with experience of driving action based on data-driven insights. Ability to turn vague concepts and asks into well-documented and effective business metrics and storytelling through data insights.<br>* Track record of operating independently, demonstrating creativity, being detail-oriented, and delivering results in a highly organized manner<br>* Comfort working across time zones, remote teams and cultures required
